website_summaries.verdict: The Adaone glass cutter's pencil style barrel fits well in the hand and handles all the thickness levels of beer and wine bottles.
pros: Carbide allow cutting wheel, handles 5mm to 15mm glass thicknesses
Metal knocking head provides clean breaks
cons: Oil cartridge can arrive empty or damaged
Heavy pressure required for best results

customer_reviews.title: Excellent for mirror cutting.
customer_reviews.text: I cut a large mirror into pieces, it worke fantastically. I just used Spray lubricant and steel ruler.
customer_reviews.author: JH

customer_reviews.title: Meh
customer_reviews.text: Barely scratched the high quality wall mirror I was resizing. The mirror broke MOSTLY along the scratch line, but really that's a big fail. The tool simply didn't score the glass deep enough for a proper break. Fortunately, the mirror was a practice piece for finding a good cutter. Might work for the occasional hobbiest using ultra thin glass; otherwise it's a clear pass.
customer_reviews.author: RaeRae

customer_reviews.title: Junk
customer_reviews.text: Piece of junk, dont waste ur time or money. States on package that uses new 360 degree oil to help with cutting which sounds great. They leave out the fact that it comes empty with no oil at all. After finally buying oil at the store I used it once and broke. Even before it broke it barely scratched the surface of the glass and definitely didn't go through deep enough to cut anything. Save your money and buy one that actually works.
customer_reviews.author: erik fish

customer_reviews.title: This cutter works fine. I previously wrote a not so complimentary review ...
customer_reviews.text: This cutter works fine. I previously wrote a not so complimentary review but I had confused it with another cutter. My bad
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: No oil.
customer_reviews.text: Thought this included oil, it does not. My error but it seems to be at least implied.
customer_reviews.author: Bennotae

customer_reviews.title: A+ for thin glass.
customer_reviews.text: For thin glass it works like a charm, if I got over 1/4" and 24" long "it" (maybe me) struggled to get clean breaks.
customer_reviews.author: Cisco A.

customer_reviews.title: Almost useless
customer_reviews.text: It’s nearly impossible to cut a straight line with this even with a guide and it barely cuts. I ended up having to trash the piece of mirroe I was trying to save with this.
customer_reviews.author: Joel

customer_reviews.title: Cuts but doesn't hold oil
customer_reviews.text: This feels nice and cuts well but the oil would not come out the tip. I bought 2 and this happened to both. I just kept a cap of oil nearby but it was disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: colleen smith

customer_reviews.title: Not recommended
customer_reviews.text: Don’t buy this. Don’t waste your money on this. Just purchase the portable glass blade from your local store is better than this one
customer_reviews.author: Xppppp

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: I enjoyed using it to cut glass and mirror, I was amazed at how easy this cutter was to use.
customer_reviews.author: Bass Ken

customer_reviews.title: Clean cuts less pressure needed.
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use pencil grip cutter. It's really stepped up my cutting game. Was using a pistol grip cutter before and I'm glad I tried this one out.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: So far not impressed
customer_reviews.text: Haven’t used it yet but right out of the package I was not impressed. Looks sturdy. A small dropper was included but no oil. ??? We’ll see how it works later. Then I’ll add an update
customer_reviews.author: Handyangie

customer_reviews.title: Performs well
customer_reviews.text: First time cutting 1/4 inch glass and this cutter worked very well for me.
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth C.

customer_reviews.title: good cutter for the money
customer_reviews.text: definitely worth it for the money. comfortable grip. the cutter worked great on 3/16 and 1/4 clear and mirror. even worked good on the pattern glass like aquatex. cutting heads are the same as the CRL`s T600 if u need replacement blades. never hurts to have acouple spares.
customer_reviews.author: RSC

customer_reviews.title: NO OIL
customer_reviews.text: I bought this glass cutter as it came with cutting oil which the others did not. When I received the cutter the tube with the oil was empty. Very disappointed in this product.
customer_reviews.author: gary gosewisch

customer_reviews.title: Worked like a charm!
customer_reviews.text: We needed a mirror for a bathroom we are remodeling and rather than buy a new one, I figured I'd try cutting the old one down to size. If it broke, I would only be out a little money for the glass cutter. Luckily, I was able to cut about 8-10 inches off of a big mirror and it cut very cleanly. I had never cut a piece of glass in my life, but I couldn't be happier with the results!
customer_reviews.author: just a guy

customer_reviews.title: Garbage
customer_reviews.text: This thing is absolute garbage it is not scoring the glass at all no matter how much pressure I put in save yourself the money this thing is junk
customer_reviews.author: GCG

customer_reviews.title: Very solid glass cutter.
customer_reviews.text: A high quality tool for cutting glass that has a small chamber you can fill up with oil to ensure smooth and precise cuts.
customer_reviews.author: Mickey

customer_reviews.title: Do not waste your time.
customer_reviews.text: Out of 18 attempts, I had one semi clean cut. I then purchased a $3 cutter from a box store and every cut went clean.
customer_reviews.author: roconnor

customer_reviews.title: Great weighted product feels good in hand.
customer_reviews.text: Cuts great, nice feel in the hand, great product. I would recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Sheri

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t work with 4mm think glass
customer_reviews.text: This thing is complete garbage. It doesn’t work on glass with thickness of 4mm as claimed by this product.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Chipps

customer_reviews.title: It is very easy to use and it has a beautiful looking
customer_reviews.text: It is very easy to use and it has a beautiful looking. I used this to cut the glasses, and it works very well!!! I will definitely recommend to buy it, if you need to cut glasses!!!
customer_reviews.author: Rinda

product_meta.title: Adaone 5mm-15mm Metal Handle Pencil Style Oil Feed Tungsten Carbide Tip Glass Cutter Cutting Tools, Mosaic/Tiles/Stained Glass Cutting Tool(Gold)
product_meta.description:
Features:
1.Applied to cutting stained glass and other craft and household uses.
2.With antislip handle, for safety and comfortable grip
3.Glass cutting head is replaceable and can 360-degree rotate
4.Mini size,easy to carry around
5.An ideal tool for household and cutting work

Specifications:
1.Product Material: Metal head and handle, carbide wheel blade
2.Size: 7.5" x 0.6" x 0.5" 
3.Product weight: 75g
4.Color: As shown in the picture
5.Cutting Range: 5-15mm glass .

Note:
1.Glass cutter can not be used to cut high hardness objects, such as toughened glass, vitrified brick, marble, quartz and so on.
2.Need to operated on a flat surface or on a desktop.It's better to try this a couple of times on a scrap piece of glass for practice.
3.Please remember to wear eye and hand protection when use this glass cutting tools.
4.Oil is not include.

Package includes:
1 x Adevena Glass Cutter
1 x Oil dropper

Our products are well tested before delivery,please feel confortable to buy, If any problem, please feel free to contact us, we'll help you at once.
feature_bullets: Carbide alloy cutting wheel, high hardness and sharp cutting,more smooth cutting, can cut 5mm-15mm thickness glass, an ideal tool for stained glass, diamond and minerals cutting.
Anti-skid durable metal handle, ergonomics handle design, holding feel comfortable, long time use saving labor.
Glass cutting head is replaceable and can 360-degree rotate, use oil dropper add some kerosene into the glass cutting tool, make the cutting head is more fluent and sharp.
Round metal knocking head, Used for knocking glass after cutting or put it under the scratches of glass and split the glass.
Adevena glass cutter tool, mini size, easy to carry around. An ideal tool for household and cutting work.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.1 out of 5 stars110 ratings4.1 out of 5 stars
